requirement.en: During the turn you Normal Summoned this card, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This turn, this card's name becomes "The Dragon". Then, if the only monsters in your Graveyard are High Dragon and/or Dragon Type monsters, you can Fusion Summon a High Dragon Type monster with 2000 DEF by shuffling monsters from your hand and/or field into the owner's Deck as material.
